answers.answer: I have gestational diabetes too. This is my third pregnancy as well and have never had it before. It's taken a while to get used to it but it is like second nature now. Good luck with it. (I was diagnosed at seven weeks I am now 24weeks and I am 27)
There is a FB group which have helpes me tons. Gestational diabetes is the name

question: Any ever get it?this is my third pregnancy and first time iv had gestational diabetes..and im 24..if anybody has or had any advice
title: gestational diabetes
